lender.name: janet rasolo
lender.occupational_info: My name is Janet and I work as a personal carer taking care of the elderly people.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it feels wonderful to be able to help someone build their futures!
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy, sell & build homes.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupation: Market developer for a social networking website
lender.loan_because: Using smart market principles is an elegant and powerful way to alleviate poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people connect with each other.

lender.name: Sam Whiteman
lender.loan_because: There are so many people in the world that could benefit from the cash that I'd normally spend on relatively insignificant items.

lender.name: Jazz
lender.occupational_info: eating, sleeping, purring, and more sleeping

lender.name: kirsten
lender.loan_because: we all need a hand up from time to time.

lender.name: kirby
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become independant and prosperous.
lender.occupational_info: I make medicine.

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: I have some spare cash and believe that hand outs prove nothing - helping people help themselves is far more sustainable.
lender.occupational_info:
Work with Information Systems building web sites.
Have contributed many pages to Wikipedia.

lender.name: Shinnosuke
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea to share dreams with someone else in the world. I have already joined foster parents program for a few yaers, but recently I watched a TV program fearturing KIVA, and decided to join it because I can realize to whom I contribure on KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked as a project manager in a security company in Japan since I graduated from a university.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It fills me with hope and joy.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a director, choreographer, writer, and a teacher.

lender.name: Patricia Pena Watson
lender.loan_because: There's nothing more important in life than empowering people. I've been empowered in many ways throughout my life, and I want to give it back in some way.

lender.name: HAYLEY
lender.loan_because: we need to help each other.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderful way to actually help, it's not just a thought of "wouldn't it be nice" but it's real and tangible.

lender.name: Satoshi
lender.loan_because: i'd like to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: i hope my job can help and promote to create better life for every individuals on the earth by using information and communication technologies.

lender.name: setcookie
lender.loan_because: i believe in grassroot work and strengthening local environments. the concept of kiva is great - only that i feel that not enough infos are given in the different projects sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: Web developer, multimedia producer, project manager, e-entrepeneur

lender.name: Robert Hanna
lender.whereabouts: Isle of Arran Outer Hebrides, Scotland.
lender.loan_because: The best things in life aren't THINGS ! "Be the change you want to see in the world."
lender.occupational_info: I live some of the time on the Isle of Arran West Scotland but get to travel far and wide meeting people who are making life better for all of us. Kiva is a great example of how things can get better.

lender.name: Janas and Sigute
lender.occupation: Living and enjoying this wonderful life we have.
lender.loan_because: 1.) We love the idea of financial independence and freedom. 2.) Everyone deserves a chance to get out of poverty. 3.) Actions speak louder than words. 4.) And most of all because we can!
lender.occupational_info: Secular Humanist, Liberal and Bright (http://www.the-brights.net). (62 Kiva countries collected so far)

lender.name: kapoon
lender.loan_because: I believe. Society will become better if people wish the bright future. However, it may be fantasy.

lender.name: Burt
lender.loan_because: The Micro Loan concept is fantastic. While it's still important to donate to large charities, with Kiva I really enjoy reading peoples stories, like being able to choose a recipient and am at ease knowing how my money is being used.
lender.occupational_info: Accounting

lender.name: Hrafnar
lender.loan_because: "I am because we are"

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: The people asking for Kiva loans are actively working to improve their lives and their family's lives. They're doing all the hard work, all we have to do is loan them some money for a financial jumpstart. Where else can you improve someone's life with so little personal effort? Too much of our time is spent in selfish pursuits and it's refreshing to give instead of take. I wish all of you the best, take care!
lender.occupational_info: I help our company provide service to large customers. This includes providing information, coordinating equipment repairs and acting as a go-between for the 2 companies.

lender.name: CHERYL
lender.loan_because: giving back is important and investing in someone else's future makes mine that much richer!
lender.occupational_info: manage child care and housing for the government

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a great idea to reach out to others to give them a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I have chosen a rather stressful but very rewarding job- that of teaching.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I am a single mother and know what it is like to try to earn money with a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I help people take care of their skin.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: We appreciate what we have.
lender.occupational_info: TV Producers, Real Estate Investors and Web Entrepreneurs

lender.name: ian
lender.loan_because: It gives you a great feeling and you can see the idividuals who will benifit from your donation.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to pay the bills, my friends, family, rachel and my dog chilli are what make me happy..... along with Aberdeen Football Club winning!

lender.name: Almut
lender.loan_because: it's a good way to help
lender.occupational_info: i support human being to find and go their own way. I startet alone with two children because it was my dream to do this work. Now I'm really happy, about my decision and my courage for this project.

lender.name: Hud P.
lender.loan_because: I am learning to share my blessings with people around the world and it feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I hope to be an engineer one day like my dad! I would use my creative skills to design projects to help people have better lives.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, for all of us. Everyone benefits.

lender.name: Dena
lender.loan_because: you are my neighbor.

lender.name: Jennifer and Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world community and help support those trying to make it but needing a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach environmental education through a zoo

lender.name: Kenneth Frazier
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepeneurs in other countries

lender.name: Maria Vuolo
lender.loan_because: There is always somebody who needs it more that I do.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed. Years ago, when I needed help someone believed in me and I was able to start a business. Helping others with creative financing works.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It helps others achieve their goals by lending a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I market many products on the Internet and receive a commission when someone buys the products (affiliate marketing.)

lender.name: Alanna Jo
lender.loan_because: everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: someday i will be a caregiver.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Everyone in this world needs a little help...
lender.occupational_info: Helping dreams become a reality....

lender.name: OMas
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, helping people who create entertainment.

lender.name: Lynne,Nick,Matthew
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves

lender.name: Mary & Marty
lender.loan_because: micro finance is one of the great ideas of our time. It's a small way we can help people achieve a better life.

lender.name: Deidra
lender.loan_because: of my passion for empowering others with what they need to take care of themselves. It's more than a handout, it's a gift that lasts for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to a be a teacher for students with disabilities.

lender.name: Mimosa
lender.loan_because: I believe every person can make a difference in the world around them.

lender.name: AJ Slater
lender.occupational_info: I program computers for large websites.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: My puppy made me do it! ;-)
lender.occupational_info: I teach swimming to young children to help them become safer around water and to give them a life-long skill.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I am deeply inspired by the potential impact of such a small contribution.
lender.occupational_info: Business management consulting and project management to the Department of the Navy.

lender.name: Ursula Petula Barzey
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help others less fortunate become financially independent.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I care that others get the same opportunity I've been afforded- and if all that takes is a $25 loan to get started, I'm all for it!
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for our clients, to help their business.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: Student at Georgia Tech

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: being a Kiva donor makes me so happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a librarian, and volunteer for a number of groups, especially those working with children.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T46KBzKwgdk

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Tikkun Olam - Perfecting the World
lender.occupational_info: I am on the left. My daughter doesn't like this picture - she says it makes her look like an Amazon. Too bad! She should have had a mother who knows how to crop pictures.

lender.name: AnnMarie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance for a better life.

lender.name: Jo and Miles
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We have so much and others have so little.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to think of what you don't have, but just giving a little in a small way makes you appreciate more of what you do have. This is the best way to feel an individual difference on a large scale in this enormous interconnected world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the power industry aiding in the development, expansion and regulation of electricity in the Midwest, bringing energy from a power plant to homes & businesses.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.occupational_info: I work in client protection for microfinance.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who dont have the advantages that I have

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I wan to change the world
lender.occupational_info: Recording Music

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: We have so much in the U.S. and I want to share it with someone who could use it to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that shows people the world. My job is about helping people see the wonders of North America.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work to prevent, diagnose and treat oral disease in people of all ages.

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy, painless way to help.
lender.occupational_info: piano teacher

lender.name: Ayani
lender.occupational_info: I teach 6th graders how to read hebrew and form their own modern Jewish Identity as well as teaching kids of various ages the basics of guitar and bass theory.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: My sisters and brothers around the world have needs and I have been entrusted with resources to share. Perhaps in some small way these loans can provide hope to the recipients.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a little help in order to make significant improvements to thier lives and to the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I manage business and development for equipment used to make mobile voice and data calls.

lender.name: Venita
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves as well as others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist employees to reach personal and organizational goals.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I'm so grateful that I have the money to help people who want to help themselves and make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies that employ our computer consultants.

lender.name: Phil & Jackie
lender.loan_because: It's freeing. "Cast but a glance at riches, and they are gone, for they will surely sprout wings and fly off to the sky like an eagle." Prov 23: 5 "A generous man will himself be blessed,,,," Prov 22:9
lender.occupational_info: Responds to critical patients & transports them to local hospitals as a Paramedic when not fighting fires as a Firefighter. Jackie teaches music, art and physical education to kindergarteners at our kids school.

lender.name: Livy
lender.loan_because: Icare about those who need help to succeed!

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: to help others to acheive what so many of us in the world take for granted;, a safe and happy home, a healthy family and a peace of mind that all children will also grow up to be safe, healthy and happy. xxxxxx
lender.occupational_info: I help low income families into housing.

lender.name: iolanda&marcello
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed by Gods Mercy and want to share our love and abundance by paying it forward. May every dollar lent, bring peace, love, joy and richness.
lender.occupational_info: We own a beautiful Spanish and Portuguese restaruant in Sydney's CBD. The food is delicious, the service caring and upbeat and the vibe is happy.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: this is an excellent grassroot programme. This is the least I can do for being lucky enough to be in Canada!

lender.name: Andi
lender.occupation: MD at eps gmbh, a service provider for events
lender.loan_because: everyone should
lender.occupational_info: we provide technical equipment for events such as grandstands, grass protection systems, temporary roads, crowd control, portable room systems and much more.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I found a penny
lender.occupational_info: I blow my vuvuzela at the government all day long

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have some extra money saved for graduate school. Before I spend it on myself, I would like to share it with people from around the world in order to see it contribute towards improving the quality of peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I work for a restaurant/bar/movie theater as a food and beverage server. My job is to help run the movie theater and to set-up weddings/parties/concerts and to serve food and drink to the people there. I am also going to college where I take courses that will prepare me for graduate school. Ultimately, I am hoping to work as a physician's assistant.

lender.name: The Legges
lender.loan_because: We believe in the concept of making someone self sufficient. 'Give a man a fish and you feed home for a day Teach him how to fish and he will feed himself for life"
lender.occupational_info: We are a family who work in a variety of areas while we are not rich we share what we have.

lender.name: ramesh
lender.loan_because: I can and others need
lender.occupational_info: I'm a University academic

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I've had the good fortune to be able to spend time in many of the countries where the lending takes place. Microlending is a fantastic way of helping those places and people make the most of their talent and potential.
lender.occupational_info: I help organisations understand their worlds and make better choices.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: It gives me a warm fuzzy feeling

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: i hope to make a difference to others lives so they too may do the same to others one day.
lender.occupational_info: i buy and sell houses and land for clients and myself.

lender.name: Katrin
lender.loan_because: "It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness." Confucius

lender.name: Harriette
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for a good life and maybe having a little bit extra.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students who have disabilities.

lender.name: WHBC
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and help change people's lives. God has blessed us so we could in turn bless other people. We hope our efforts might bring someone closer to the saving graces of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: We are a diverse group of adults meeting on Sunday mornings to learn more about Jesus Christ and enjoy each other's fellowship.

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: I have so much

lender.name: Hazel
lender.loan_because: With a small amount of money you can help people to start enterprises, gain confidence with their success and vastly improve the quality of their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Tamara Cristine
lender.loan_because: I'm encouraged by the borrowers' stories
lender.occupational_info: I was a Kiva Fellow in Mongolia & a volunteer consultant in the Kiva SF office. Check out XacBank loans on Kiva :)

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: I love to see people fulfilling their dreams and being able to help that be possible.

lender.name: Henny
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to make a better life for themselves and I want to show my son that not everybody has the same oppertunities as he has in this world.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I believe that "teaching someone how to fish" can be very helpful in many cases.
lender.occupational_info: As a physical therapist my clinic attempts to help anyone with neck- and back pain.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want others around the world to share in the opportunities of democracy and free-markets.
lender.occupational_info: I help in the development of software programs for the banking industry.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help to enable people with limited resources to make their lives better for themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Cyprus
lender.loan_because: Cyprus Moments believes in our childrens future
lender.occupational_info: Cyprus Wedding Organizer

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who work to help themselves.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I can :)
lender.occupational_info: I learn stuff! I go to the local community college. I've also applied for a few part-time jobs, but haven't heard back from them yet.

lender.name: Nancy & Jim
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate to have many friends who have given us help and encouragement along the way. We try to do what we can each day to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Nancy manages our local hospital's accounts receivable department & teaches classes at the community college. Jim manages the maintenance department at a local resort.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I have so much and with Kiva it takes very little to help other women achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help create afforable housing so that families can spend their energy and money to improve their lives without having to worry about paying the rent.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want to support people out there that work hard to make their lives & families lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites & advertising campaigns to sell different brands, products & services.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Teaching others to fish is better than giving fish away. Kiva is the best way to spread prosperity that I've found.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I help improve public education for children in my community.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve the quality of their lives .

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, teacher and scientist. I study forests and climate change. I love our world and all the people in it.

lender.name: Girish Mosh
lender.loan_because: Feel drawn to share

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: i like to help people,and it will make this world a better place.

lender.name: Kristin and Alan
lender.loan_because: people with a vision should be able to be independent and improve their lives.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to give those with less access to capital an opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the automotive business as an International Marketing Manager.

lender.name: Kathy & Bob
lender.loan_because: We have a great amount of respect for people trying to make an honest living. We have received a fair amount of help in our lives and appreciate the opportunity to help others.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping to help and maybe like this make a better world?!?!?!...
lender.occupational_info: I am a specialist in hand therapy helping people to recover after any kind of hand injury,enabeling them to go back to their work and hobbies.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Lending to build capacity in people to care for themselves, the environment, and each other.
lender.occupational_info: Matthew is working on a PhD in Geography. He is emphasizing the development of new computer algorithms to better understand the phenomenon of drought in space and time.

lender.name: Jeff and Jill
lender.occupation: Res Home Product Estimator, Stay-At-Home Mom
lender.loan_because: People have loaned and even given money to me and my wife to help us. We want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff: My company builds new houses, and I estimate the cost of each house built as well as create purchase orders for material and labor. Jill: I mostly stay at home to raise our two children, and I also have part-time work as a tutor and as an aid for a real estate agent.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: ....this is one of the most convincing initiatives to help people getting a fulfilled and active life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a passionate musician (violin, viola) and believe in the power of music to make friends and create peace!

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Non-fiction writer, author and speaker.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I am lucky, not rich, but with Kiva I can support people trying to help themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I help children who can not live with their parents find loving and safe homes

lender.name: Steffen
lender.loan_because: I've got what I need for myself and still have a surplus for others. And lend money repaid can be used again (and again and....)..

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: opening my heart and my hand to others makes me more at peace with myself.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent over 30 years caring for the elderly, mostly in their own homes, helping them to live the best life possible for as long as they live.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help people you may never have had the chance to meet otherwise

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Good economics can change the world.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I care about people

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I've had tough times and appreciate need, frustration, and hope. Life is easier now, and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: To give children the academic and life skills tools that they will need to become the best citizens for our world.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work on strategy for large scale organisational change and also help business executives to understand better why they make the decisions they do and how they can grow and improve.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: The Violet Crowns
lender.loan_because: To honor our dear friend Mary who had a very generous heart.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: to be honest, it just feels so good to know that in some way maybe I can be of service to someone else as hundreds of people have helped me throughout my many ventures.
lender.occupational_info:
When we decided to launch a company called Mental Messages in March 2004, we loved the name, and we had a vague idea that the company would have something to do with inspiration, motivation and personal development, but other than that, we had no grand plan. Now with a little time into our exploration and evolution, and with the release of our magazine “mental messages” we have a clear idea of “what we want to be”, a company that focuses all of it’s efforts on sharing ideas, stories and resources that inspire people to explore and tap into their own vast pool of personal potential. For us we truly can’t think of a better way to “make a living”. Kim, Jennifer and Jay Jacobs
mental messages "it all begins with the seed of an idea"

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I can help someone to help themselves, and that way they can in turn help their communities and families and the next generation.

lender.name: Lisa and Aaron
lender.loan_because: This is our way to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: The people are trying hard to improve the lives of themselves, their families and communities and are out there 'having a go'.

lender.name: Staci Lichterman
lender.loan_because: the old adage works - helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Nathan & Kristen
lender.loan_because: The greatest thing that one can do is to do something for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Nathan is the editor of a trade newspaper, writes poetry and fiction, and edits freelance. Kristen works full time at a Catholic elementary school.

lender.name: Norman Family
lender.loan_because: Micro lending is an easy way for us to make a big difference in someone's life. We believe in hard work of any kind.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families and children that are at risk of being separated because of a variety of mental health, behavioral or legal issues. I teach them skills to help them stay together.

lender.name: Shinjiro
lender.loan_because: all human beings deserve better lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I was born on Oct. 18th, 1967. I have spent most of my life in Osaka and Tokyo, Japan, but I have lived in Frankfurt, Chicago, and London with my wife. I traveled many countries during twenty years including North America, South America, Asia, Europe, and Africa. My experience told me that the world is worth living.
I am lucky enough to have a good job and I have almost nothing to worry about my life. So I think it is about time to start helping other people. I seriously hope to have a world without poverty and war.

lender.name: Marie-Pierre
lender.occupational_info: Je protege la nature des activités humaines (I protect nature from the activity of human)

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to someone's life and be able to give back to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I proudly work for the Australian Red Cross Blood Service in Melbourne Australia as a Technician processing whole blood donations into it's different components.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate and I feel it is incumbent upon me to do what I can to help others less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I run the BEST tanning salon in Houston, Texas!!!

lender.name: Patricia & Spencer
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to live a comfortable life with two incomes and no children to feed. By sharing and lending to others, we hope to give more people around the world the opportunity to live well and provide for their children.
lender.occupational_info:
Patricia helps raise awareness and educate others in her community about poverty, violence and homelessness in the U.S.
Spencer is an architect and builder working on small, smart remodels for friends and neighbors.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Poverty is destabilizing. People are less likely to destroy their communities if they're invested in them!

lender.name: customizemyminifig.com
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, I am very fortunate to live in a wealthy country.

lender.name: MAQSOOD
lender.loan_because: my wife has a diploma in dressmaking and she wants to earn for our family.
lender.occupational_info: my wife,s work to designe the dresses.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to help themselves, and Kiva makes me feel more directly connected.
lender.occupational_info: I work on customer sites around the world, helping my company's clients use our software better.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Because I believe that Social entrepreneurs can reclaim the definition of "value"

lender.name: Doann
lender.loan_because: ...To those who much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: People are great, governments suck.

lender.name: Kati
lender.occupational_info: Wildlife and Conservation Biology

lender.name: greg + kai
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to help and we want to learn.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: ...we reap what we sow.
lender.occupational_info: I help customers solve business problems with software, and provide technical advice.

lender.name: Nola
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a welfare organisation and take care of the telephones, computers and networked servers.

lender.name: Gil
lender.loan_because: I rather help someone buy a fishing rod rather than give them a fish.
lender.occupational_info: Doing what I can to make sure Government is doing a positive job.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to travel to many countries and I have seen how a little can go a long long way. I want to help these countries grow so all their people may prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses find ways to improve their products. I am married and have two daughters, 14 and 9.

lender.name: Brian & Kris
lender.loan_because: We like to help people help themselves

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: The people of this planet need to live and work in cooperation and harmony with each other and the planet. If we dont take care of ourselves and this Earth we will all be up the creek without a planet.

lender.name: Zai
lender.occupational_info: I'm a third-year student at Yale University. When I'm not taking classes for the psychology major, I teach health education to high school students in New Haven; specifically workshops on contraception and healthy sexuality. This summer, I'll be teaching HIV/AIDS prevention in Arusha, Tanzania, and running a psychological study in my free time there.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: To share the benefits of chance I experience.

lender.name: Hannah Family
lender.loan_because: We like the idea that people can pull together to make the world a better place and to support people who are eager to make a difference in the lives of themselves and their families. And its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: So little can have such a profound impact .

lender.name: Robert Joseph Williams
lender.loan_because: I read about this site in Bill Clinton's book 'Giving'. I hope that everyone who can will choose to help someone through this site with any donation possible. It is my duty to give back so that others may have a rewarding and fulfilled life. It is the very least I can do. 'The world is built on chesed.'
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in a nuclear plant for almost 10 years. However, my real job is trying to be the best human being possible. I try but often fail, yet I continue to care deeply about those whose lives are a daily struggle. My wish is that everyone in the world have the chance to reach their potential and live a fulfilled and purposeful life. May it be so...

lender.name: roberta
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way I can help others . .. and I'm so impressed with the spirit of the people. I loan to honor them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother and a retired teacher. That's my beautiful daughter Hannah in my photo

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to strive, specially if you do not have anyone to turn to for help. Sometimes you just need that tiny additional push.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very technical (and solution-oriented) but a great deal of it has to do with direct contact with people: with colleagues, business partners, Customers. And that's my favorite part! I do get to travel a lot, which is very tiring, but at the same time I feel very priviliged for being given the oportunity to see the world.

lender.name: Marian Koning
lender.loan_because: it is a direct, transparant and nice way to make a difference in someone’s life. I love the teamwork; a few small amounts - big succes! Team Dutch Bloggers for Kiva

lender.name: Dave and Laura
lender.loan_because: We know it's not easy getting the capital you need to start or grow a business. We've been helped by others in the past, and we're just trying to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: We own several companies in Las Vegas, NV. One is a watercraft rental business and the other is an online nutritional supplement business.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and one of the ways to do that is to help to empower people. To see the gifts we all have to share that enrich our planet. I love to travel and meet people from all different cultures. This is the greatest education we can offer to our children.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their personal and spiritual development. A great deal of my work is with children and young people, particularly those that most vulnerable. I try to inspire and help people to open to their uniqueness and their unlimited potential.

lender.name: safe.com - alexandra
lender.whereabouts: Lisboa Rua de Pedrouços, 17 - R/C Esqº

lender.name: Diane
lender.whereabouts: Isle of Wight England Isle of Wight

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupation: student, studying to be special education teacher

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: You have the ability. You need the money. Now you've got both.
lender.occupational_info: I write advertisments

lender.name: Ashok
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference by doing my small bit..

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer, on which I make sure lines are straight and letters look nice. And I make a good living doing that... amazing eh?

lender.name: Dick
lender.occupational_info: I help companies promote themselves on the internet.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Most of the world’s problems can be solved by strong economic conditions and education. Lending through Kiva is an investment in a greater global economy for the future.
lender.occupational_info: Most of my companies are online and offer services related to online marketing, data retrieval, data organization, and data storage. We also depend on global investments for revenue.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I believe that those of us in the developed world need to make helping the rest our priority. I don't have a lot in comparison to my neighbors, but I have enough to lend.
lender.occupational_info: Our business takes audio recordings of interviews and meetings and types them into the computer for research or archiving.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I look after web and mail servers for a large university. I'm in the Territorial Army - the UK Army reserve.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I had help to get where I am, and now I pass it on. That's what it's all about.
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs: I work with people who want to stop using drugs and alcohol. And...I help families adopt orphans from other countries.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: its an easy way to help people don't having so much as we.

lender.name: Tessha
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: colleen
lender.loan_because: it makes me a koooool person :)

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: To help struggling entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and technology.

lender.name: LeChez & Andy Solages
lender.loan_because: This is a convenient way for us to support a handful of entrepreneurs in the Caribbean and Africa.
lender.occupational_info: For fun and profit, I help businesses run smoother, take advantage of new opportunities, and keep partners happy. My professional life is a lot of fun and I am fortunate to share it with a diverse set of intelligent friends who each impress me in their own way.

lender.name: Srinath
lender.loan_because: It's fun to help others
lender.occupational_info: Im a finance manage in a large corporation. I help decide which projects we should do and not do.

lender.name: Anja
lender.loan_because: I read about kiva and some of the projects in a magazine and think microcredits may be a good and effective way to help people all over the world to build up an independent life.

lender.name: Susanna O!
lender.loan_because: someone who loved me helped me reach for my dream. Kiva helps the circle of love grow throughout the world...as each dream comes true, thanks to the love shared, peace comes to the world, one heart at a time.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Peace and change begins with each of us.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Bra Boutique helping women find support and beauty.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: because it is a good thing, and a fine way to learn about people
lender.occupational_info: i am 7 3/4

lender.name: Alliance Steel Trading
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping people who want to help themselves through hard work and creative ideas.
lender.occupational_info: Steel import and export

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women, be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I test and review Blue Cross & Blue Shield benefits before they are officially loaded to the system.

lender.name: Rev. Kelly
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It helps people become self sufficient and hopefully make their community stronger and more stable.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math.

lender.name: Oxi Brite Inc
lender.occupational_info: Our company makes environmentally friendly cleaners .

lender.name: Marz and Susanne
lender.loan_because: ...it feels good to be a small part of a bigger picture. If everyone in the world had this mentality, we could accomplish wondrous feats - like the abolishment of human suffering.
lender.occupational_info: Our job is enjoyable and interesting. We work with artist/entertainers who are passionate about what they do. That's why we want to help people to live their dreams; seeking to calm their desire for more.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: Hell, I got that bit of money on the bank account doing nothing, so it might as well help people that need it and have ideas rather than just profit my greedy banker. :)
lender.occupational_info: behind the desk developing websites, sort of, waiting for the next opportunity to travel the world, meet new people, do a bit of good around me.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe in every person's vision for themselves and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Design models and implants to aid in patient specfic (custom) surgical procedures.

lender.name: Per Kristian
lender.loan_because: I wish to help the entrepreneurs build a sustainable income that can make their life better and help their local community thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a programmer and develope mainly web based software solutions, like websites, portals and webshops.

lender.name: Abhilash
lender.loan_because: I love people who sweat and toil to earn their bread, instead of beg, in spite of severe hardships and poverty. And I wish to empower such people. With the dream that they, in turn, empower more people to work for their living.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer and an oilman. I travel around the world and wish to contribute my tiny bit to the society wherever I go. Meanwhile, I spend some time encouraging social activism in my country, India.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: as a current graduate student getting my degree in the field of social work I feel a responsibility to help others in need. I believe in a Creator who gives us second chances...he's given me many more. Why not give to others the mercy and grace He's shown me.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: It is so easy and feels so good. Also and obviously, because I want to help others who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: My work currently involves simply living as an environmentally sensitive life as I can. I am also working to uncomplicate my life, but that is difficult given my fascination with technology.

lender.name: Roy Neil
lender.loan_because: the Kiva program seems to be a way to link up with others around the world who enjoy work and want to live useful, productive lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college writing and literature classes on a campus that is part of the state university system. I also write and publish papers, mostly on literary topics.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: Like the movie Office Space.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world and it is my job to help a citizen in need, wherever they are.
lender.occupational_info: I am the first manager of sustainability for Iron Moutain. I get to spend every day thinking about how my company can meet its business goals while also doing great things for our community and the environment!

lender.name: Kristi-lee Gordon
lender.loan_because: There are people in this world who need financial assistance more then I do. I have been fortunate in my life to be blessed with a safe home and a healthy family, and by loaning money to these people, I hope they can have a wonderful life as well.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I think everybody who has enough money should give at least a little bit to the poorer people in the world.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I am part of an organisation that purchases and improves commerical and residential property throughout Europe by co-investing alongside local real estate companies.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I can. I am thankful that I was born here and have all these opportunities so many people don't have. Our world is getting smaller by the day and I am happy to be able to help others who are less fortunate. I also strongly admire all entrepreneurs who work hard to make a living. Plus I hope the loans are some motivation, I know it would motivate me, if someone from across the world believed in me :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work in administration at a home for old people. I try to make everything run smoothly for the old people and their relatives. I like my work and my colleagues.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising space on popular American websites (one being Better Homes & Gardens, BHG.com).

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care about people and want to help. My thanks to Kiva for making it easy to help others:-)
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Office of Diversity at a community college in Kansas.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: It helps others get the footing they need to succeed.

lender.name: ross
lender.loan_because: To share, help, and knit the world into a better place for everyone
lender.occupational_info: I start up companies, then manage and grow them, then move on to a next venture.

lender.name: bendid
lender.loan_because: I feel that Kiva and its field partner really enable and empower people to take life into their own hands in economic terms.
lender.occupational_info: Since I work in bank myself, I feel that access to capital for the right price is absolutely necessary for economic progress and activity. Transaction cost and institutional constrains make it difficult for large financial institutions to make micro loans. Hence, an organization like Kiva and its field partner are an important and revolutionary capital allocation and transmission link!

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: A modest amount (in our society) of financial help can make a big difference to someone in another (less privileged) society.
lender.occupational_info: Designing industrial printers.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way!
lender.occupational_info: I help other people take care of their money.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: I find it truly amazing that the simple act of giving can provide poor people with optimistic plans for the future and help households cope with everyday life.

lender.name: Ranjani
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to encourage and empower individuals who are willing to work hard in persuit of their dreams.

lender.name: katie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to live a decent life

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I load because I can. My parents were born in Poland under communism and though we have all three grown up as studied, thoughtful, educated people, I am the one that has comparatively huge financial resources to share. I simply owe to others that which is not my wealth, but rather my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the education field, but not directly in the classroom. There are teachers of children, there are principals who organize and support a whole school of teachers, and there are superintendents who give help and information to schools. My work is in research, helping these educators, mostly principals and superintendents, to make decisions with information about how students learn, and what types of programs work well for as many as 100,000 students at a time.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I have personally recognized that I am blessed more than I am worth. The only thing that makes me happy is giving in all the ways I can, in all the time I can, and as often as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who's personal goal in life is success for others. How that comes about I'm still in the process of figuring out.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help those in need and willing to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their printing and marketing needs

lender.name: Haruna
lender.loan_because: i want to continue my education
lender.occupational_info: teacher who want to complete his education and for any department.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who cannot live in a nice home. I want to do what I can to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find their dream homes, first homes, and really help them feel like they are getting the best home for their family.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and protect historical materials from around the world, for future generations to enjoy and study.

lender.name: Maughan Family
lender.occupation: A teacher, a stay-at-home mom, and 3 crazy kids
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to do my bit to help people who are doing a lot to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I install, set up and provide training for accounting systems.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people become financially independent and these loans are a big step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save and invest money for important events in their lives like buying a house, sending their child to college and retiring.

lender.name: Coleen
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to assist folks in being independent and able to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We publish technical conference proceedings on CD and the web.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for drafting and design of structures, for housing and commercial use.

lender.name: Chikara
lender.loan_because: you will make the whole world happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Computational Linguistics, which aims at enabling human language understanding by computer.

lender.name: PoshaBeauty
lender.loan_because: We believe in Hope, Humanity and Compassion.
